00009 class C_TextureTGA : public C_TextureLoader
00010 {
00011     private :
00012         typedef struct
00013         {
00014             GLubyte Header[12];                                                                 // TGA File Header
00015         } TGAHeader;
00016 
00017         typedef struct
00018         {
00019             GLubyte             header[6];                                                              // First 6 Useful Bytes From The Header
00020             GLuint              bytesPerPixel;                                                  // Holds Number Of Bytes Per Pixel Used In The TGA File
00021             GLuint              imageSize;                                                              // Used To Store The Image Size When Setting Aside Ram
00022             GLuint              temp;                                                                   // Temporary Variable
00023             GLuint              type;
00024             GLuint              Height;                                                                 //Height of Image
00025             GLuint              Width;                                                                  //Width ofImage
00026             GLuint              Bpp;                                                                    // Bits Per Pixel
00027         } TGA;
00028 
00029 
00030         TGAHeader tgaheader;                                                                    // TGA header
00031         TGA       tga;                                                                              // TGA image data
00032 
00033         static const GLubyte uTGAcompare[12];   // Uncompressed TGA Header
00034         static const GLubyte cTGAcompare[12];   // Compressed TGA Header
00035 
00036         bool LoadUncompressedTGA(S_Texture * texture, const char * filename, FILE * fTGA);
00037         bool LoadCompressedTGA(S_Texture * texture, const char * filename, FILE * fTGA);
00038     public :
00039         bool Load(S_Texture * texture, const char * filename);
00040         C_TextureTGA();
